alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 06 at 5:28PM AKDT until July 07 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT FRIDAY FOR UPPER TANANA VALLEY AND THE FORTYMILE COUNTRY... * AFFECTED AREA...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country. * TIMING...Until 10 PM AKDT Friday. Red flag conditions will resume on Friday afternoon. * WINDS...South 5 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 22 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Around 70. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
